title: Wrong link in http://talks.golang.org/2012/splash.article
body:
by **matematika.adit**: 
There are wrong link in http://talks.golang.org/2012/splash.article
at section 12. Semantics [http://talks.golang.org/2012/splash.article#TOC_12.]

In the last paragraph of that section, the link golang.org should point to
http://golang.org, not http://talks.golang.org/2012/golang.org that didn't exist.

The cause of this wrong link was this line:
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/2012/splash.article?repo=talks#657

The link [[golang.org]] lacking a protocol, so it's parsed as a relative link.
